doc.title: Making Angels
doc.plot: Dorothy, a blond-haired, blue-eyed trust fund baby, resides at the renowned Algonquin Hotel with her feisty grandmother, Claire. She encounters Wilamena, who leaves her cheating husband with nothing but a partially completed doctorate in psychology and a custom-designed set of Armani luggage! The three women collide with Monica, an African-American novelist with a mysterious past, and Monica's former roommate, Sadja, a beautiful ballerina with the clock ticking rapidly on her career! All of them find hope, romance and friendship through the courageous choices necessary to achieve the highest of arts- love, and the truly inspired life.
